title: The Plantronics Voyager Legend UC®
description:
Finally, a UC headset that works hard to make things easy. The Plantronics Voyager Legend UC® meets the demands of mobile professionals like never before. With connectivity to PC, smartphone, or tablet, sensors, precisely-tuned audio, voice controls and advanced charging accessories -- it's the only headset system you need for your mobile life.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Plantronics 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Plantronics 
Pinterest: http://pinterest.com/plantronics/ 
LinkedIn:  http://www.linkedin.com/company/plantronics 
Google+:  https://plus.google.com/115819579753558199235/posts 
Website: www.plantronics.com
